soc.game
Interface DevCardConstants

All Known Implementing Classes:
Player
public interface DevCardConstants

This is a list of constants for representing types of development cards in Settlers of Catan. MIN is the lowest value (lowest "known"), MAX_KNOWN is highest "known", and UNKNOWN is higher than MAX_KNOWN.

If you add values here, be sure to update javadocs at server.giveDevCard, .handleGAMETEXTMSG and .sendGameStateOVER , and handpanel.updateDevCards .

Field Summary

          capitol, governors-house VP card

static int UNKNOWN
          Dev-card of unknown type, for reporting to other players
